Banner.Description: I have 6 years of experience in developing technological solutions. I have worked with technologies such as Angular, NodeJS, ExpressJS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Postgres. My focus is on providing fast, efficient, scalable solutions while maintaining quality standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I have 6 years of experience in developing technological solutions. I consider myself a proactive person passionate about continuous professional growth.

I enjoy learning new technologies and staying updated with the latest trends in the field. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, NodeJS, and ExpressJS, applying best practices and development standards.

Additionally, I enjoy coordinating teams and working collaboratively with other professionals. I thrive in a team dynamic and find satisfaction in leading and coordinating teams to achieve common goals. My ability to quickly adapt to new technologies is another strength. I am excited to learn and tackle technical challenges in an ever-evolving environment.
I believe adaptability and curiosity are key to success in the current technological world.
Some of the technologies I have worked with and trained in include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Teach Lead
Description: Part of the development coordination team
Development and deployment of in-house projects using Postgres, Node, and Angular
Task management and meeting planning with stakeholders

Experience.Jobs.Title: Javascript and PL/SQL Developer
Description: Development of products for social welfare organizations using APEX

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Part of the technical reference team
Development and deployment of projects for municipalities (Fines Court System used by the province of Mendoza and the municipality of Godoy Cruz)
Meetings and direct interaction with the client

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects I have participated in and/or currently involved in

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CROASIST
FeatureProjects.Projects.Label: Main Project
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: CROASIST is the beginning of my entrepreneurship, and we are currently in meetings with various stakeholders. This versatile and comprehensive tool aims to streamline attendance and human resources administration, facilitating information recording, employee tracking, and document management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This Angular project allows you to view a brief description of a person, their work experience, personal projects, studies, and contact information.

Studies.Title: Studies

Studies.Certifications.Title: Computer Analyst (UNC)
Studies.Certifications.Description: My education as a Computer Analyst at FaMAF has provided me with a solid foundation in various aspects of computer science. I have trained in programming, systems analysis, database management, and acquired skills to solve complex problems using innovative tools and techniques. I am prepared to face current and future technological challenges and make significant contributions in the field of computing.

Studies.Certifications.Title: Strategic Negotiation (Mundos E)
Studies.Certifications.Description: This course provided me with a focus on finding mutually beneficial solutions and achieving successful agreements in any negotiation situation.

Studies.Certifications.Title: Angular (CoderHouse)
Studies.Certifications.Description: After completing the Angular course from Coderhouse, I have gained solid skills in developing web applications with Angular. I now have the ability to create interactive and scalable applications using components, directives, and services. Additionally, I have acquired knowledge in TypeScript and can apply development best practices, thanks to the focus and training provided by Coderhouse.

Contact.Content: If you liked my profile and want to get in touch, you can reach me through any of the available means. Thank you for visiting my portfolio.
